description: Source file for the CMAgent class implementation, including function definitions for managing parameter retrieval, setting, attribute configuration, object management, health checks, and session handling in the RDK middleware component.

classes.name: CMAgent
classes.description: C++ class implementing the CMAgent logic for parameter management and component control.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the CMAgent, registers wrapper methods with the agent.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up prerequisites necessary for the module, such as registering the agent.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Cleans up or resets prerequisites after testing.

methods.name: void CMAgent_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void CMAgent_Set(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void CMAgent_Set_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs set and get operations for parameter validation.

methods.name: void CMAgent_GetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void CMAgent_SetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void CMAgent_GetNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Gets parameter names under a specified path.

methods.name: void CMAgent_AddObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds a new object row in a table parameter.

methods.name: void CMAgent_DelObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void CMAgent_SetCommit(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Commits changes made to parameters or objects.

methods.name: void CMAgent_GetHealth(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves health status of a component.

methods.name: void CMAgent_SetSessionId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the session ID for a component.
